amendment.description: To require an annual allied burden sharing report.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2084 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2084 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Lee to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4196) To require an annual allied burden sharing report.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2084 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2084 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Lee to Amendment SA 2301.
